Package fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.software.applicationvm.interfaces

Interface ApplicationVMManagementI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationVM, ApplicationVMManagementConnector, ApplicationVMManagementInboundPort, ApplicationVMManagementOutboundPort
    public interface ApplicationVMManagementI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface ApplicationVMManagementI defines the methods to manage an application virtual machine component.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : August 25, 2015

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

        allocate cores to the application virtual machine.

        Contract

         pre    allocatedCores != null and allocatedCores.length != 0
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        allocatedCores - array of cores already reserved provided to the VM.

      • connectOutboundPorts

        void connectOutboundPorts​(java.lang.String requestNotificationInboundPortURI)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Connecte les outboundports de l'avm Différent du precedent, cette méthode sert à l'avm libre de se connecter au composant qui va recevoir les notifications

        Contract

         pre    requestNotificationInboundPortURI != null 
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        requestNotificationInboundPortURI - uri du composant ou l'avm envoie la notification de terminaison d'un requete
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
